mapper.insert: insert into customer (cus_user_id, cus_top_type, cus_category, cus_title, cus_content, cus_photo, cus_writetime, cus_answer) values (#{cus_user_id}, #{cus_top_type}, #{cus_category}, #{cus_title}, #{cus_content}, #{cus_photo}, now(), #{cus_answer})
mapper.select: select * from customer order by cus_num desc
select * from customer where cus_top_type = #{cus_top_type} order by cus_num desc
select count(*) from customer where cus_top_type = #{cus_top_type}
select * from customer where cus_top_type = #{cus_top_type} order by cus_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
